basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Martha Quintanilla-Ramirez I am a software developer Specializing in JavaScript with a background in finances and customer service. I assisted and trained over 100 personal bankers by reviewing court order documents and walking through loan applications. Becoming a software developer means I get to challenge myself in new ways. As a Latina, I want to showcase my skills, bridging the gap between communities of color and the tech industry. It's important to me to bring diversity to any team I work with to empower people from all walks of life. Technology is evolving rapidly, and I want to be a part of the growth and contribute in any way I can. Mentor Connect is an app myself and my team designed for underserved youths providing them a service to connect with a mentor in tech to guide them early in their education. I am looking forward to making an impact in any company I work with. Thank you ðŸ’œ

projects.title: About Me/Busmall
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: The Running Shoe Guide
projects.description: The Running Shoe Guide walks the users through a questionaire to pair them up with 3 different pairs of running shoes  based on their selection. Used grid layout and Css to design the page, and used Javascript for the functionality. We created an information page to show case the difference in shoe comfortability. :)

projects.title: JimCo
projects.description: Make a cookie clicker style game called JimCo. Competitiveness and appeal to players who are wanting to gegt highscores, we Used AWS to deploy live page abd utilize Socket.io, context, React, chance and stable diffusion.
